creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
description: elaborate randa; red background with green, blue and yellow warp strips; two panels are stitched together with randa in yellow, pink, blue, purple; two rows of geometric design at center; small brocaded designs throughout the piece; three selvedges
medium: Cotton, silk; discontinuous supplementary weft patterning, embroidery
title: Cargador
